description:
After the trauma of losing a Centennial Pandemonium fight, Takeru becomes afraid to enter the black mist.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Come On Down, Once-in-a-Millennium Me! The Yasha Mask That Guides Takeru
Sennen ni Hitori no Ore, Orite Koi! Takeru o Michibiku Yasha no Men
千年に一人の俺, 降りて来い! タケルを導く夜叉の面
